style_dna: cinematic moody lighting, high contrast, desaturated colors with warm undertones, film grain texture, shallow depth of field, dramatic shadows, golden hour ambiance
prompt_template: A {subject} in a {scene} setting, featuring {palette} color palette, with {lighting} lighting, shot with {camera} camera settings, conveying a {mood} mood, with {details} details

variables.label: Color Palette
variables.suggestedValue: warm desaturated tones with amber and deep blue accents

variables.label: Lighting
variables.suggestedValue: cinematic moody lighting with dramatic shadows and golden hour warmth

variables.label: Camera
variables.suggestedValue: 85mm lens, f/1.4, shallow depth of field

variables.label: Details
variables.suggestedValue: film grain texture, subtle vignette, soft focus on background

variables.label: Style DNA
variables.suggestedValue: cinematic moody lighting, high contrast, desaturated colors with warm undertones, film grain texture, shallow depth of field, dramatic shadows, golden hour ambiance

negative_prompt: oversaturated colors, harsh lighting, digital artifacts, low quality, blurry, distorted, cartoon style, anime style

recommended_settings.notes: Recommended for portrait-style images with cinematic feel

composition.framing: rule of thirds, subject slightly off-center

warnings: Style may rely on model-specific features that cannot be perfectly replicated
Composition matching is best-effort in MVP version
